features.name: Resume Parsing
features.description: AI-powered resume parsing that extracts structured data from uploaded PDF, DOCX, DOC, and TXT files. Supports DREAM context-aware parsing to tailor extraction based on target company and role.

features.name: PDF Generation
features.description: Generates professional ATS-friendly PDF CVs from form data using xhtml2pdf. Includes Unicode sanitization, base64 image handling, and dynamic skill category labels based on cohort.

features.name: LLM Service
features.description: Service for interacting with OpenRouter LLM API. Handles career objective generation, section formatting, suggestions, and planned skills generation. Includes JSON parsing with repair for truncated responses.

features.name: Photo Upload
features.description: Handles photo uploads for CV profile pictures. Converts images to base64 data URLs for in-memory use. Supports PNG, JPG, and JPEG formats.

features.name: Career Objective Generation
features.description: AI-powered career objective generation that blends 50% dream company details with 50% resume content. Creates professional 2-3 line career objectives tailored to target role and company.

features.name: Planned Skills Suggestion
features.description: Generates recommended skills and certifications based on DREAM target (cohort, company, role, technology) and current skills. Provides learning path recommendations.

features.name: Section Formatting
features.description: AI-powered text formatting for CV sections. Improves language while maintaining original meaning, making content concise and impactful for 2-page CV format.

features.name: File Text Extraction
features.description: Extracts text content from various file formats including PDF, DOCX, DOC, and TXT. Uses PyPDF2 for PDFs and python-docx for Word documents.

features.name: API Routes
features.description: RESTful API endpoints for CV operations including upload_photo, parse_resume, generate_pdf, generate_career_objective, generate_planned_skills, format_section, and get_suggestions. Includes alias routes for test compatibility.

features.name: Frontend Form
features.description: Interactive multi-step form for CV creation with sections for personal details, DREAM company targeting, academic qualifications, technical skills, projects, internships, and certifications.

features.name: CV Preview
features.description: Real-time preview of CV content as user fills the form. Displays formatted CV sections with proper styling.

features.name: API Client
features.description: JavaScript client for making API calls to backend endpoints. Handles file uploads, form submissions, and error handling.

features.name: Configuration Management
features.description: Environment-based configuration with support for development, production, and testing modes. Manages API keys, file upload settings, and LLM parameters.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Comprehensive error handling with JSON error responses for API endpoints. Handles 400, 404, 405, and 500 errors with appropriate JSON responses.

features.name: Health Check
features.description: Health check endpoint for testing server availability and API status.
